title: All You Need Is Kill
creator: Hiroshi Sakurazaka and Yoshitoshi ABe
description: When the alien Mimics invade, Keiji Kiriya is just one of many recruits shoved into a suit of battle armor called a Jacket and sent out to kill. Keiji dies on the battlefield, only to be reborn each morning to fight and die again and again. On his 158th iteration, he gets a message from a mysterious allyâ€”the female soldier known as the Full Metal Bitch. Is she the key to Keiji's escape or his final death?
